</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Creates a field applying the ITK discrete gaussian image filter to the source field. This means that each pixel value in the new field is based on a weighted average of the pixel and the surrounding pixel values from the source field. Pixels further away are given a lower weighting. Increasing the variance increases the width of the gaussian distribution used and hence the number of pixels used to calculate the weighted average. This smooths the image more. A limit is set on the max_kernel_width used to approximate the guassian to ensure the calculation completes.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Newly created field </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field_module</span></tt> - <p>Region field module which will own new field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_field</span></tt> - <p>The field to be filtered </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</dd>

</p>

<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram</span></tt> - <p>The image filter to query. </p>

<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesCount</span></tt> - <p>The size of the maximum_values array to fill. Values for component beyond the size set use the last value. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesOut</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive maximum_values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1accb9143dbb9fa1eaf118c8376153b405"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_set_compute_maximum_values</strong>(cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_id imagefilter_histogram, int valuesCount, const double * valuesIn)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the maximum values to be computed for generating the histogram. The default maximum values for new histogram filter is 1.0 for each source component. Note: The value set for the last source component applies to higher order components.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram</span></tt> - <p>The image filter to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesCount</span></tt> - <p>The size of the valuesIn array, &gt;= 1. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesIn</span></tt> - <p>Array of maximum values (&gt;=1) for each source component, with the last number in array applying to all higher order components. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1afe6a895a0792307f168271b35fd38eed"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_get_number_of_bins</strong>(cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_id imagefilter_histogram, int valuesCount, int * valuesOut)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the number of bins used to generate histogram. Higher number of bins increase the density and gives greater precision to the density estimation.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_set_number_of_bins </dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The actual number of number of bin values, this should be the same as the number of source components Returns 0 on error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram</span></tt> - <p>The image filter to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesCount</span></tt> - <p>The size of the number_of_bins array to fill. Values for component beyond the size set use the last value. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesOut</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive numbers of bins. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1ab25641e0fbaaf36a95aa5a2c7b394313"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_set_number_of_bins</strong>(cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_id imagefilter_histogram, int valuesCount, const int * valuesIn)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the number of bins used to generate histogram. Higher number of bins increase the density and gives greater precision to the density estimation. This value can be set for each source field component. The default number of bins for new histogram filter is 64 for each source component. Note: The value set for the last source component applies to higher order components.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram</span></tt> - <p>The image filter to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesCount</span></tt> - <p>The size of the valuesIn array, &gt;= 1. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesIn</span></tt> - <p>Array of number of bins (&gt;=1) for each source component, with the last number in array applying to all higher order components. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1a5a809684582e4cee8594838afb5dd1b3"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API double <strong>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_get_marginal_scale</strong>(cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_id imagefilter_histogram)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the marginal scale value for this image filter. The Marginal scale is used to define a fraction of the bin width to be used as a tolerance around the upper bound of the bin.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_set_marginal_scale </dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The current marginal value, or 0.0 on error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram</span></tt> - <p>The histogram image filter to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1ab25aac8ee6894612abbc70580bc81a28"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_set_marginal_scale</strong>(cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_id imagefilter_histogram, double marginal_scale)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the marginal scale value for this image filter. The Marginal scale is used to define a fraction of the bin width to be used as a tolerance around the upper bound of the bin. The default marginal_scale for new histogram filter is 10.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram</span></tt> - <p>The histogram image filter to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">marginal_scale</span></tt> - <p>The marginal_scale value to be set. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1aa1224b6235bdae8d7531079ff7257c7c"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_C_INLINE cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_base_cast</strong>(cmzn_field_imagefilter_histogram_id imagefilter_histogram)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Cast imagefilter_histogram field back to its base field and return the field. IMPORTANT NOTE: Returned field does not have incremented reference count and must not be destroyed. Use cmzn_field_access() to add a reference if maintaining returned handle beyond the lifetime of the derived field. Use this function to call base-class API, e.g.: cmzn_field_set_name(cmzn_field_derived_base_cast(derived_field), &#8220;bob&#8221;);</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Non-accessed handle to the base field or NULL if failed. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_discrete_gaussian</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the imagefilter_discrete_gaussian field to cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldimageprocessing_8h_1ac970925fbe52ca5f00c9cac16da94510"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the imagefilter_histogram field and sets it to NULL. Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">imagefilter_histogram_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to the field to destroy. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Creates a field returning the values resulting from matrix multiplication &lt;source_field1&gt; x &lt;source_field2&gt;, with &lt;number_of_rows&gt; rows in both &lt;source_field1&gt; and the result. From the &lt;number_of_rows&gt; the columns in &lt;source_field1&gt;, rows in &lt;source_field2&gt; and then columns in &lt;source_field2&gt; are implied and checked.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Newly created matrix with N*P components. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field_module</span></tt> - <p>Region field module which will own new field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number_of_rows</span></tt> - <p>Number of rows N in source_field1 and result. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_field1</span></tt> - <p>N rows * M columns component matrix field 1. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_field2</span></tt> - <p>M rows * P columns component matrix field 2. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldmatrixoperators_8h_1a9a7412e59a1cbf490b1063b6465bf541"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_fieldmodule_create_field_projection</strong>(cmzn_fieldmodule_id field_module, cmzn_field_id source_field, cmzn_field_id projection_matrix_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Creates a projection field returning the result of a matrix multiplication with perspective division on the source field vector. The source_field vector is expanded to a homogeneous coordinate by appending a component of value 1, which is multiplied by the projection_matrix_field, and the extra calculated value resulting from the unit component is used to divide through each of the other components to give a perspective projection in the resulting field. The projection_matrix_field must have have a multiple of (source_field-&gt;number_of_components + 1) components forming a matrix with that many columns and the resulting (number_of_components + 1) rows. The first values in the projection_matrix are across the first row, followed by the next row and so on. Hence a 4x4 matrix transforms a 3-component vector to a 3-component vector: [x&#8217;] = [m1 m2 m3 m4 ][x] [y&#8217;] = [m5 m6 m7 m8 ][y] [z&#8217;] = [m9 m10 m11 m12][z] [h&#8217;] = [m13 m14 m15 m16][1] The resulting field returns 3 components [x&#8217;/h&#8217;, y&#8217;/h&#8217;, z&#8217;/h&#8217;]</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Newly created field. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field_module</span></tt> - <p>Region field module which will own new field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_field</span></tt> - <p>Source vector field to project. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">projection_matrix_field</span></tt> - <p>Field supplying projection matrix. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincfieldmatrixoperators_8h_1a640da9134ccfb94dd30c7364794986a4"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_fieldmodule_create_field_transpose</strong>(cmzn_fieldmodule_id field_module, int source_number_of_rows, cmzn_field_id source_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Creates a field returning the transpose of N*M matrix source_field. The source_number_of_rows is specified; source_number_of_columns is computed as source_field-&gt;number_of_components / &lt;source_number_of_rows&gt;; this division must have no remainder.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Newly created M*N component transposed matrix field. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field_module</span></tt> - <p>Region field module which will own new field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_number_of_rows</span></tt> - <p>Number of rows N in source_field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_field</span></tt> - <p>N rows * M columns component matrix field. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>

<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_fieldmodule_create_field_sceneviewer_projection</strong>(cmzn_fieldmodule_id field_module, cmzn_sceneviewer_id sceneviewer, enum cmzn_scenecoordinatesystem from_coordinate_system, enum cmzn_scenecoordinatesystem to_coordinate_system)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>FILE : fieldsceneviewerprojection.h</p>
<p>A field which extract a transformation matrix from a scene viewer for use in field expressions. Creates a field whose values are the 4x4 transformation matrix mapping coordinates between two scene coordinate systems for a scene viewer. The matrix maps homogeneous coordinates (x,y,z,1) to (x&#8217;,y&#8217;,z&#8217;,h&#8217;) suitable for passing to a projection field. The values are continuously updated with changes to the scene viewer and become invalid if the scene viewer is destroyed. Note CMZN_SCENECOORDINATESYSTEM_LOCAL gives the local coordinate system of the scene for the owning region of field, which is transformed from world coordinates by the cumulative transformation matrices of all scenes down from the root region of the scene viewer&#8217;s scene. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_fieldmodule_create_field_projection.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Newly created field with 16 components. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field_module</span></tt> - <p>Region field module which will own new field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">sceneviewer</span></tt> - <p>Handle to cmzn_sceneviewer object. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">from_coordinate_system</span></tt> - <p>The input coordinate system for the transformation. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">to_coordinate_system</span></tt> - <p>The output coordinate system for the transformation. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>

<blockquote>

<p><p>FILE : fieldsubobjectgroup.h</p>
<p>Implements region sub object groups, e.g. node group, element group. These group fields evaluate to 1 (true) at domain locations in the group, and 0 elsewhere. Creates a node group field which packages a cmzn_nodeset_group i.e. a subset of nodes from a master nodeset. As a field it evaluates to 1 for nodes in the nodeset group and 0 elsewhere, i.e. it is the predicate for the sub- domain, and this Boolean value can be combined in logical operations with other fields.</p>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>

<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_fieldmodule_create_field_cross_product</strong>(cmzn_fieldmodule_id field_module, int number_of_source_fields, cmzn_field_id * source_fields)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>FILE : fieldvectoroperators.h</p>
<p>The public interface to the cmzn_fields that perform vector operations. Creates a vector field which is the cross product of the source_fields. The number of source fields determines the number of components i.e. dimension of the source_fields and the result. Allowable numbers: 1 : single 2-D vector source field. Returns orthogonal vector in 2-D plane given by 90 degree rotation anticlockwise. 2 : two 3-D vector source fields. Returns familiar 3-D cross product vector orthogonal to both source vectors in a right hand sense, whose magnitude is the area of the parallelogram formed by the source vectors on 2 sides. 3 : cross product of three 4-D vector source fields.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Newly created field. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field_module</span></tt> - <p>Region field module which will own the new field. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number_of_source_fields</span></tt> - <p>The size of the source_fields array, one less than the dimension i.e. number of components of each source_field and the result. Only 1, 2 and 3 fields i.e. 2-D, 3-D and 4-D are supported. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">source_fields</span></tt> - <p>Array of fields with number of components equal to the dimension i.e. one more than the number_of_source_fields. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>

<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_begin_change</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Begin caching or increment cache level for this glyph module. Call this function before making multiple changes to minimise number of change messages sent to clients. Must remember to end_change after completing changes. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_glyphmodule_end_change</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>The glyph module to begin change cache on. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1aaffc90b052ffd8713eb76a82f0e5cb2d"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_end_change</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Decrement cache level or end caching of changes for the glyph module. Call cmzn_glyphmodule_begin_change before making multiple changes and call this afterwards. When change level is restored to zero, cached change messages are sent out to clients.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>The glyph module to end change cache on. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1ab851e89585fb2fd5936d186a1bfa0ba6"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_define_standard_glyphs</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Defines a selection of standard glyphs for visualising points, vectors etc. Graphics for all standard glyphs fit in a unit cube which:</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a43dd38cfd5d0c832a9510a9c6e60d37f"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_find_glyph_by_name</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule, const char * name)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Find the glyph with the specified name, if any.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to the glyph of that name, or 0 if not found. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>Glyph module to search. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">name</span></tt> - <p>The name of the glyph. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a8b8bb9b642c88e1837b68f323fc1804e"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_find_glyph_by_glyph_shape_type</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule, enum cmzn_glyph_shape_type glyph_type)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Find the glyph with the specified type, if any.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to a glyph with that type, or 0 if not found. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>Glyph module to search. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph_type</span></tt> - <p>A glyph type identifier. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1ab663f071efd4290a665a1cb975fe3d47"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_get_default_point_glyph</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the default glyph used for new point graphics, if any.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to the default point glyph, or 0 if none. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>Glyph module to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a384b4137dd3ffacc491ba59f8cfc98be"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_set_default_point_glyph</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule, cmzn_glyph_id glyph)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the default glyph used for new point graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>CMZN_OK on success otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>Glyph module to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to set as default. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1acef63db9d05ae7c6e0aeb9add839e825"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyph_access</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id glyph)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a new reference to the glyph with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>New glyph reference with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a6bffd1503a33cda34f6c05ba3eab8608"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_destroy</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id * glyph_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the glyph (and sets it to NULL). Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph_address</span></tt> - <p>The address to the handle of the glyph to be destroyed. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1aeef335a4e79e549711bcf3427c197be3"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API bool <strong>cmzn_glyph_is_managed</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id glyph)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Get managed status of glyph in its owning glyph module. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_glyph_set_managed</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>true if glyph is managed, otherwise 0 false. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a7785c19c8dc511fa2e5a7db2d82a7411"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_set_managed</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id glyph, bool value)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set managed status of glyph in its owning glyph module. If set (managed) the glyph will remain indefinitely in the glyph module even if no external references are held. If not set (unmanaged) the glyph will be automatically removed from the module when no longer referenced externally, effectively marking it as pending destruction. All new objects are unmanaged unless stated otherwise.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">value</span></tt> - <p>The new value for the managed flag: true or false. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1af77d78de27186cba563f8df4c6b2a22a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API char * <strong>cmzn_glyph_get_name</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id glyph)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Return an allocated string containing glyph name.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Allocated string containing glyph name, or NULL on failure. Up to caller to free using cmzn_deallocate(). </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1ace717b70ded06f66536a57de58c87919"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_set_name</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id glyph, const char * name)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set name of the glyph.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">name</span></tt> - <p>Name to be set for the glyph. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a40a2f72b722d34c1f56fab27bc9b6a74"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_create_glyph_axes</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule, cmzn_glyph_id axis_glyph, double axis_width)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Create a glyph which drawing 3-D axes repeating the supplied axis glyph on three axes with the given axis width.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to new glyph or 0 on error. Up to caller to destroy. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>The glyph module to create the glyph in. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_glyph</span></tt> - <p>A glyph to repeat on each of 3 axes. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_width</span></tt> - <p>The width of each axis glyph when drawn at unit length; a fraction of 1 to give an appropriate arrow head size. Typically 0.1 for glyph &#8216;axis&#8217;, 0.25 for glyph &#8216;arrow_solid&#8217;. Must be non-negative. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a0731915279e3d98ee2dbb8530916ab19"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_axes_id <strong>cmzn_glyph_cast_axes</strong>(cmzn_glyph_id glyph)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>If the glyph is type axes, returns the type-specific handle.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Axes glyph specific representation if the input is the correct glyph type, otherwise returns NULL. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to be cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a9469b57214278887d14bc0f254787b5a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_C_INLINE cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_base_cast</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Cast axes glyph back to the base glyph type and return it. IMPORTANT NOTE: Returned glyph does not have incremented reference count and must not be destroyed. Use cmzn_glyph_access() to add a reference if maintaining returned handle beyond the lifetime of the axes glyph argument.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Non-accessed handle to the base glyph or NULL if failed. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the axes glyph to cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a9618e87a4f24c9553477b9e76f1183b8"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_destroy</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id * axes_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the axes glyph (and sets it to NULL). Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if successfully destroyed the axes glyph handle, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to the axes glyph. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a7accb1e84c4d94fc8704ff359eabe0ed"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API double <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_get_axis_width</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the width of each axis relative to unit length.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The axis width, or 0.0 if error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>The axes glyph to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a37700c4855b2e17a158b39485266a6a6"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_set_axis_width</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes, double axis_width)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the width of each axis relative to unit length. The default axis width is 0.1 i.e. 10% of the length and suitable for glyph &#8216;axis&#8217; and &#8216;axis_solid&#8217;.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>The axes glyph to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_width</span></tt> - <p>The new axis width. Must be non-negative. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a8f57440b9fd85390884934dfea139aca"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API char * <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_get_axis_label</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes, int axis_number)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the label to be drawn at the end of the given axis.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Allocated string containing label, or NULL if none or error. Up to caller to free using cmzn_deallocate(). </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>The axes glyph to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_number</span></tt> - <p>The axis number from 1 to 3. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1afb8d040cd7f9020a83591df6ad026e5a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_set_axis_label</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes, int axis_number, const char * label)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the label to be drawn at the end of the given axis.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>The axes glyph to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_number</span></tt> - <p>The axis number from 1 to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label</span></tt> - <p>The label, or NULL for none. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a2ae76f935701c8c6c11587d1373c4140"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_material_id <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_get_axis_material</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes, int axis_number)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the material an axis is drawn with.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to material or NULL if none or error. Up to caller to destroy. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>The axes glyph to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_number</span></tt> - <p>The axis number from 1 to 3. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a6aaaaf713ac2d65c3c1d1b2e93866d94"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_glyph_axes_set_axis_material</strong>(cmzn_glyph_axes_id axes, int axis_number, cmzn_material_id material)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the material an axis is drawn with. Note if the material is NULL for any axis the default material for the graphics is used for that axis.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axes</span></tt> - <p>The axes glyph to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">axis_number</span></tt> - <p>The axis number from 1 to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">material</span></tt> - <p>The material, or NULL to use the default material from the graphics. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a72b0b8bf4b9fca99ff92d548ea0d0cc1"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyphmodule_create_glyph_colour_bar</strong>(cmzn_glyphmodule_id glyphmodule, cmzn_spectrum_id spectrum)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Create a glyph which draws a colour bar for the spectrum with ticks and value labels. The glyph dynamically updates to match the current range and definition of the spectrum. Note it only shows a single component.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to new glyph or 0 on error. Up to caller to destroy. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyphmodule</span></tt> - <p>The glyph module to create the glyph in. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">spectrum</span></tt> - <p>The spectrum to be displayed on the colour bar. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a804f6abf83f653f10fee6ab901ecd2cf"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<p><p>If the glyph is type colour bar, returns the type-specific handle.</p>

<dd>Colour bar glyph specific representation if the input is the correct glyph type, otherwise returns NULL. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph</span></tt> - <p>The glyph to be cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1a067c24c831c50c730276a52b2593e546"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_C_INLINE cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_glyph_colour_bar_base_cast</strong>(cmzn_glyph_colour_bar_id colour_bar)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Cast colour bar glyph back to the base glyph type and return it. IMPORTANT NOTE: Returned glyph does not have incremented reference count and must not be destroyed. Use cmzn_glyph_access() to add a reference if maintaining returned handle beyond the lifetime of the colour_bar glyph argument.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Non-accessed handle to the base glyph or NULL if failed. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">colour_bar</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the colour_bar glyph to cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincglyph_8h_1ac5843c10ec783f88a54b48206f24f8c5"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the colour_bar glyph (and sets it to NULL). Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dd>Status CMZN_OK if successfully destroyed the colour_bar glyph handle, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">colour_bar_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to the colour_bar glyph. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the vector defining the main axis of the colour bar.</p>

</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesOut</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive axis vector. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">colour_bar</span></tt> - <p>The colour bar glyph to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesCount</span></tt> - <p>The size of valuesIn array. Sets maximum of 3 values. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesIn</span></tt> - <p>Array containing axis vector. If fewer than 3 values then assumes zero for remaining components. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

<blockquote>

<p><p>Set the number format used to write value labels on the colour bar. This is a C printf format string with a single numerical format in the form: %[+/-/0][length] Other characters can be added before or after the number format. Note a literal % is entered by repeating it i.e. %%. The default format is &#8220;%+.4e&#8221;.</p>

</li>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>

</dd>

</p>

<blockquote>

<p>The public interface to a zinc graphics which produces a 3-D graphics object from an algorithm using fields in a region. Returns a new reference to the graphics with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dd>New graphics reference with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<p><p>Set the width used for rendering line primitives in GL in renderer &#8216;point units&#8217;, typically pixels for on-screen display but scalable to ensure lines are of appropriate thickness on high resolution output. Note there may be arbitrary limits on values depending on the GL implementation, and for non-antialised rendering the nearest integer is used. The default value is 1.0.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>

<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">width</span></tt> - <p>The line render width in pixels. Value &gt; 0.0. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>

<p><p>Set the size used for rendering point primitives in GL in renderer &#8216;point units&#8217;, typically pixels for on-screen display but scalable to ensure points are of appropriate size on high resolution output. Note there may be arbitrary limits on values depending on the GL implementation, and may be rounded to the nearest integer in use. The default value is 1.0.</p>

<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ad927a317fdd78e6097676ab67185f870"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphics_set_tessellation_field</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics, cmzn_field_id tessellation_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets a field which sets tessellation quality to match its native refinement in any element (if any) and also apply refinement factors if the field function is non-linear at its native refinement. If no tessellation field is supplied, the coordinate field is checked for non-linearity of function OR coordinate system, but not native refinement.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">tessellation_field</span></tt> - <p>The field which sets tessellation quality. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a5dad68f3bcae8f33ddb286bdc2398b9d"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_graphics_get_texture_coordinate_field</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the texture coordinate field of the graphics. Caller must destroy reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to field, or 0 if none or error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a4674e24eecf10ca4a88f87cbfa5008a4"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphics_set_texture_coordinate_field</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics, cmzn_field_id texture_coordinate_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the texture coordinate field of the graphics. Values of this field specify mapping of the material&#8217;s image field to coordinates in the graphics. The texture coordinate field is currently unused by POINTS and STREAMLINES.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">texture_coordinate_field</span></tt> - <p>The field to be set as the texture coordinate field, or 0 for none. Field must have from 1 to 3 components. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a228cb87630288bb084a4e5ba66b4d5e7"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Boolean value true if visibility flag is set, false if not. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">visibility_flag</span></tt> - <p>Boolean true to set, false to clear. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets flag to generate graphics for exterior faces or lines only.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Boolean true if the exterior flag is set, otherwise false. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphics_set_exterior</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics, bool exterior)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets flag to generate graphics for exterior faces or lines only.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>

</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a2478484641fe9820b69dfdb5fb072e85"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the element face type the graphics is limited to generating graphics for.</p>

<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>

<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a762c26680b57ea4e61d62eda7a6e11f3"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the element face type the graphics is limited to generating graphics for. e.g. CMZN_ELEMENT_FACE_TYPE_XI1_0 generates graphics only on faces and lines where the top-level element &#8216;xi&#8217; coordinate equals 0.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">face_type</span></tt> - <p>A valid element face type. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Return accessed handle to the scene owning this graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to scene owning graphics, or 0 if none. Up to caller to destroy. </dd>

<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">

</p>

<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>

</dd>

</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the scene coordinate system in which to render the coordinates of graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>
</li>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Convert a short name into an enum if the name matches any of the members in the enum.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dd>the correct enum type if a match is found. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>

<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">string</span></tt> - <p>string of the short enumerator name </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a52e08ab3cc38181e94e820682eebed13"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Return an allocated short name of the enum type from the provided enum. User must call cmzn_deallocate to destroy the successfully returned string.</p>

<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">type</span></tt> - <p>enum to be converted into string </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>

</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ae74b8192c824914a081ee0fc8001cafe"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Return the name of the graphics. The graphics has no name until user sets it.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>On success: allocated string containing name, or NULL if none. Up to caller to free using cmzn_deallocate(). </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a447b49571d6d12524b0fd08f74a3c0d3"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphics_set_name</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics, const char * name)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the name of the graphics. Unlike other containers, scene can contain multiple graphics with the same name. New graphics default to having no name. A common use of the name is to mark the graphics for filtering, like metadata. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_scenefiltermodule_create_scenefilter_graphics_name</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">name</span></tt> - <p>The new name for the graphics, OR NULL to clear. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the field domain type graphics are created from with the graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the field domain type to create graphics from with the graphics. Note that all domain types are applicable to all graphics types, for example this attribute cannot be changed for LINES and SURFACES, which always use 1D and 2D elements domains, respectively.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">domain_type</span></tt> - <p>Enumerated value of the field domain type to use. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a28e11959c5a1c910d800d335a3596fd0"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>If the graphics is of type contours then this function returns the contours specific representation, otherwise returns NULL. Caller is responsible for destroying the new contours graphics reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Contours graphics specific representation if the input is the correct graphics type, otherwise returns NULL. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to be cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a4a4b005fdf528f2ff47df4065e0cfb57"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_C_INLINE cmzn_graphics_id <strong>cmzn_graphics_contours_base_cast</strong>(cmzn_graphics_contours_id contours)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Cast contours graphics back to its base graphics and return the graphics. IMPORTANT NOTE: Returned graphics does not have incremented reference count and must not be destroyed. Use cmzn_graphics_access() to add a reference if maintaining returned handle beyond the lifetime of the contours graphics argument.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Non-accessed handle to the base graphics or NULL if failed. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">contours</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the contours graphics to cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a08f8e0ebd56be962ce4f2a8b7092a635"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphics_contours_destroy</strong>(cmzn_graphics_contours_id * contours_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the contours graphics (and sets it to NULL). Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if successfully destroyed the contours graphics handle, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">contours_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to the contours graphics. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a00404a4fefa7cf386403d3ed4591c78d"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_graphics_contours_get_isoscalar_field</strong>(cmzn_graphics_contours_id contours)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the isoscalar field for the contours graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to isoscalar field, or 0 if none or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">contours</span></tt> - <p>The contours graphics to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a653b77723f2e9fb327f7bcd044d08d85"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphics_contours_set_isoscalar_field</strong>(cmzn_graphics_contours_id contours, cmzn_field_id isoscalar_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the isoscalar field for the contours graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">contours</span></tt> - <p>The Contours graphics to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">isoscalar_field</span></tt> - <p>The isoscalar field to set, this field must have only one component. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Get the iso values for the contours graphics when it has been set as an explicit list. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphics_contours_set_list_isovalues.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The actual number of iso values that have been explicitly set using cmzn_graphics_contours_set_list_isovalues. This can be more than the number requested, so a second call may be needed with a larger array. A zero return value can indicate isovalues were set as a range, not as an explicit list. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">contours</span></tt> - <p>The contours graphics to query. </p>
</li>

<p><p>If the graphics produces lines or extrusions then returns a handle to the line attribute object for specifying section profile and scaling.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to line attributes object, or 0 if not supported for graphics type or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to request line attributes from. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a13076e35d7815e435f1d5e849ead35bf"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_access</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a new reference to the line attributes with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>New line attributes reference with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a0226f36fd736cdd89f0db794c5cf6027"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_destroy</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id * line_attributes_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the line attributes, and sets it to 0. Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if successfully destroyed the handle, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to the line attributes. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a3510f1d8ba37e65fe4e3d6e4ada03e88"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_get_base_size</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes, int number, double * base_size)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the base size of the extrusion section, one value for each lateral axis. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_base_size.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of base size values to request, starting with the first lateral axis. If fewer values have been set it is padded with the last base size value. 1 to 2 values can be obtained. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">base_size</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive base sizes. Must be big enough to contain the specified number of values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ab7dc7952f553c44a10eeaa9d132b094d"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_base_size</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes, int number, const double * base_size)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the base size of the extrusion section, one value for each lateral axis. 1 to 2 values can be set. For a unit section profile, the final size in each lateral direction is: base_size + scale_factor * field_scalar where field_scalar is determined from the orientation_scale_field. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_orientation_scale_field. The default base size is zero. Note: for lines (circle_extrusion shape) only one value is currently used; the second value is constrained to equal the first value.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of base size values to set, starting with the first lateral axis. If fewer values are set than the number of axes, the last value is assumed for subsequent axes. Hence a single value can be used to set a diameter for a unit circle profile. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">base_size</span></tt> - <p>Array of base sizes with the number of values specified. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a7da7f8cf900708fbcc2ec5b86063c036"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_get_orientation_scale_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the orientation scale field from the graphics line attributes. This controls lateral scaling and orientation of line extrusions. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_orientation_scale_field</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to orientation scale field, or 0 if none or error. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a9f0b97502230c93350ec7450c065e25a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_orientation_scale_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes, cmzn_field_id orientation_scale_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the orientation scale field in the graphics line attributes. This controls lateral scaling and orientation of line extrusions. Note: Currently it is only used to supply a scalar field for scaling cylinders and with default scale factor of 1 it gives its diameter. Soon we will offer more options for controlling extrusions.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">orientation_scale_field</span></tt> - <p>The orientation scale field to set. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1aa45e684d671e81bdefc80b91d4f18bbf"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_get_scale_factors</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes, int number, double * scale_factors)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the scale factors used in sizing the extrusion section, one value for each lateral axis. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_scale_factors.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of scale_factors to request, starting with the first lateral axis. If fewer values have been set it is padded with the last scale factor value. 1 to 2 values can be obtained. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scale_factors</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive scale factors. Must be big enough to contain the specified number of values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a72a972fa49a8bc85544946d7d3456afb"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_scale_factors</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes, int number, const double * scale_factors)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the scale factors used in sizing the extrusion section, one value for each lateral axis. 1 to 2 values can be set. For a unit section profile, the final size in each lateral direction is: base_size + scale_factor * field_scalar where field_scalar is determined from the orientation_scale_field. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_orientation_scale_field. Scale factor values default to 1. Note: for lines (circle_extrusion shape) only one value is currently used; the second value is constrained to equal the first value.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of scale factor values to set, starting with the first lateral axis. If fewer values are set than the number of axes, the last value is assumed for subsequent axes. Hence a single value applies to all axes. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scale_factors</span></tt> - <p>Array of scale factors with the number of values specified. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a35af571b63f8f44cc7ba7384ede916a6"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API enum cmzn_graphicslineattributes_shape_type <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_get_shape_type</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the shape or profile of graphics generated for lines. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_repeat_mode</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The current shape type. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a0ab63910e2b008e232424ed15d9f9f74"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_set_shape_type</strong>(cmzn_graphicslineattributes_id line_attributes, enum cmzn_graphicslineattributes_shape_type shape_type)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the shape or profile of graphics generated for lines: LINE, RIBBON, CIRCLE_EXTRUSION or SQUARE_EXTRUSION. Note: only LINE and CIRCLE_EXTRUSION are supported for LINES type; all shapes are supported for STREAMLINES. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicslineattributes_shape_type</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The line_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">shape_type</span></tt> - <p>The new shape type enumeration. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ada0ab4ffceb1d0707f85d9e655bf9665"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id <strong>cmzn_graphics_get_graphicspointattributes</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>If the graphics produces points then returns a handle to point attribute object for specifying glyph, scaling fields, scale factors and labels.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to point attributes object, or 0 if not supported for graphics type or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to request point attributes from. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a new reference to the point attributes with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>New point attributes reference with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_destroy</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id * point_attributes_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>

<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if successfully destroyed the handle, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to the point attributes. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
