<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a6576314c67bfa8a59c69d023d02d15a2"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_base_size</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, double * base_size)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the base size of the point glyph, up to 3 values, one for each axis. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_base_size.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of base size values to request, starting with the first axis. If fewer values have been set it is padded with the last base size value. 1 to 3 values can be obtained. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">base_size</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive base sizes. Must be big enough to contain the specified number of values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ac967b254bbb3e770a6e9a3ab7378ec1d"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_base_size</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, const double * base_size)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the base size of the point glyph, up to 3 values, one for each axis. For a unit sized glyph, the final size in each direction is: base_size + scale_factor * field_scalar where field_scalar is determined from the orientation_scale_field. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_orientation_scale_field. The default base size is zero. Tip: to visualise a 2- or 3-component vector orientation_scale_field, use a base size of 0,D,D with scale factors 1,0,0. This ensures the length equals the magnitude and the glyph is fixed to size D on the orthogonal axes.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of base size values to set, starting with the first axis. If fewer values are set than the number of axes, the last value is assumed for subsequent axes. Hence a single value can be used to set the diameter for a unit sphere glyph. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">base_size</span></tt> - <p>Array of base sizes with the number of values specified. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1aa6ff0dc4017a0f6fdbf5c3f183237c6a"></span><div class="line-block">

</div>
</p>

<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a7c19af144d23ef40e265e590ef0d9b76"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_font</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, cmzn_font_id font)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the font in the graphics point attributes used to draw the label field.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>

</dd>

</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_glyph_id <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_glyph</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the glyph in the graphics point attributes used to visualise points.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to glyph, or 0 if none or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">

<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, cmzn_glyph_id glyph)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the glyph in the graphics point attributes used to visualise points.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to modify. </p>

<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ac269e3c8d46471fa97e7f869189dc7a2"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_glyph_offset</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, double * offset)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the offset from the point coordinates to where the glyph origin is drawn, in glyph units along the glyph local axes. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_offset.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of offset values to request, up to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">offset</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive offset values, starting with the first axis. Must be big enough to contain the specified number of values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1afcbfc5f2f57b113219d6c2dafbccb276"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_offset</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, const double * offset)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the offset from the point coordinates to where the glyph origin is drawn, in glyph units along the glyph local axes. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_orientation_scale_field. Tip: offset values can give the effect of moving the centre point / origin of the glyph: just pass in negative coordinates for the new origin.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of offset values to set, up to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">offset</span></tt> - <p>Array of offset values, starting with the first axis. If fewer than 3 then zero is assumed for all other offset values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ae2cea9a0ac20e5d422ddebeb6cb7f614"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API enum cmzn_glyph_repeat_mode <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_glyph_repeat_mode</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Return the current glyph repeat mode. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_repeat_mode</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The current glyph repeat mode. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ad06b7372880acce484ce268c13211e5b"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_repeat_mode</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, enum cmzn_glyph_repeat_mode glyph_repeat_mode)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the glyph repeat mode which controls whether multiple glyphs are drawn at each point and how. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_glyph_repeat_mode</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph_repeat_mode</span></tt> - <p>The new repeat mode. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a0db17f82f7a5abcb19229aa1d72806e6"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API enum cmzn_glyph_shape_type <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_glyph_shape_type</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the enumerated value identifying the current glyph used in the point attributes.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The glyph type identifier, or CMZN_GLYPH_SHAPE_TYPE_INVALID if invalid arguments or glyph does not have a valid type. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a8550ddf604a5802417f486e4fab66a0c"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_shape_type</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, enum cmzn_glyph_shape_type glyph_shape_type)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the glyph used for visualising a graphics point from a set of enumerations. Requires standard glyphs to first be created. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_glyphmodule_define_standard_glyphs If no glyph exists with the type identifier, the glyph is unchanged.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">glyph_shape_type</span></tt> - <p>The glyph shape type identifier. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1af2787d031f6d7a453d3d25b5bd0e968b"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_label_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the label field from the graphics point attributes.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to label field, or 0 if none or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a6b525d359d61b8fada44a0d920b7d21e"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_label_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, cmzn_field_id label_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the label field in the graphics point attributes. A string representation of this field&#8217;s value (if defined) is drawn with the current font at the glyph offset.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label_field</span></tt> - <p>The label field to set. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a8c404aff834e3e90f3549b61d679599f"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_label_offset</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, double * label_offset)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the label offset relative to the glyph axes from its origin. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_label_offset</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of offset values to request, up to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label_offset</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive offset values, starting with the first axis. Must be big enough to contain the specified number of values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ad22fc79144349911451c7111017c5150"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_label_offset</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, const double * label_offset)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the label offset relative to the glyph axes from its origin set by the glyph offset. A unit offset moves the label the length of the axis vector. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_orientation_scale_field.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of offset values to set, up to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label_offset</span></tt> - <p>Array of offset values, starting with the first axis. If fewer than 3 then zero is assumed for all other offset values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a8fb6d5fc8d7feada353796529d40e4f5"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API char * <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_label_text</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int label_number)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Get static label text to be shown near each glyph. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_label_text</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Allocated string containing label text, or NULL if none or error. Up to caller to free using cmzn_deallocate(). </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label_number</span></tt> - <p>The label_number to get, from 1 to 3. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a50ad075ae150679e4caea4cd7a2fd18d"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_label_text</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int label_number, const char * label_text)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Set static label text to be shown near each glyph. The number of labels depends on the glyph repeat mode, one label per glyph for REPEAT_MODE_AXES, one label for REPEAT_MODE_NONE and REPEAT_MODE_MIRROR. Note the label field value is written for the first label only, prefixed by the first static label text. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_repeat_mode</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label_number</span></tt> - <p>The label_number to set, from 1 to 3. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">label_text</span></tt> - <p>The string to set as static label text. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a6b3cec95360c229939443985ea027304"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_orientation_scale_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the orientation scale field from the graphics point attributes. This controls scaling and orientation of point glyphs. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_orientation_scale_field</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to orientation scale field, or 0 if none or error. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a8f9276038865bb6e9c9168f19a5b60e1"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_orientation_scale_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, cmzn_field_id orientation_scale_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the orientation scale field in the graphics point attributes. This controls scaling and orientation of point glyphs. Only fields with the following numbers of components are allowed, with the prescribed behaviour: 1 : default orientation in line with local x, y and z axes, with scalar value equally applied in all 3 axes. 2 : 2-D vector giving orientation of 1st axis. 2nd vector is 90 degrees anticlockwise in 2-D plane, and 3rd vector is v1 (x) v2. Scale in all directions is magnitude of vector; use a zero scale factor to not scale in any axis. 3 : 3-D vector giving orientation of first axis. 2nd vector is arbitrary normal to this, and 3rd vector is v1 (x) v2. Scale in all directions is magnitude of vector; use a zero scale factor to not scale in any axis. 4 : 2 2-D vectors each giving orientation and scale (from magnitude) of 1st and 2nd axes. 3rd axis is v1 (x) v2 including scale from its magnitude. 6 : 2 3-D vectors each giving orientation and scale (from magnitude) of 1st and 2nd axes. 3rd axis is v1 (x) v2 including scale from its magnitude. 9 : 3 3-D vectors giving orientation and scale (from magnitude) of all 3 axes, in a right-handed sense. Note the signed scale field provides additional scaling and orientation reversal for negative values. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_signed_scale_field</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">orientation_scale_field</span></tt> - <p>The orientation scale field to set. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a50ac5efac7db621218f878b65303a0a4"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_scale_factors</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, double * scale_factors)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the scale factors used in sizing the point glyph, up to 3 values, one for each axis. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_scale_factors.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of scale_factors to request, starting with the first axis. If fewer values have been set it is padded with the last scale factor value. 1 to 3 values can be obtained. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scale_factors</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive scale factors. Must be big enough to contain the specified number of values. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1a73240c93af6c431ad5438d881b9f2e2f"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_scale_factors</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, int number, const double * scale_factors)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the scale factors used in sizing the point glyph, up to 3 values, one for each axis. For a unit sized glyph, the final size in each direction is: base_size + scale_factor * field_scalar where field_scalar is determined from the orientation_scale_field. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_orientation_scale_field. Scale factor values default to 1. Tip: to visualise a 2- or 3-component vector orientation_scale_field, use a base size of 0,D,D with scale factors 1,0,0. This ensures the length equals the magnitude and the glyph is fixed to size D on the orthogonal axes.</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point_attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number</span></tt> - <p>The number of scale factor values to set, starting with the first axis. If fewer values are set than the number of axes, the last value is assumed for subsequent axes. Hence a single value applies to all axes. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scale_factors</span></tt> - <p>Array of scale factors with the number of values specified. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1aeb8775eeb33004a4a72dc3c1c08df683"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_get_signed_scale_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Gets the signed scale field from the graphics point attributes. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_signed_scale_field</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to signed scale field, or 0 if none or error. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ab184c4c4c9f5431b1504c0cbb0093567"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_signed_scale_field</strong>(cmzn_graphicspointattributes_id point_attributes, cmzn_field_id signed_scale_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Sets the signed scale field in the graphics point attributes. Can have from 1 to 3 components which multiply the scaling from the orientation scale field on the corresponding axis. Note special behaviour applies when used with the GLYPH_REPEAT_MODE_MIRROR mode: If value is negative on the first axis, the origin of the glyph is moved to the end of the first axis and its direction is reversed. This is commonly used to draw stress and strain with mirrored arrow-like glyphs pointing inward for compression, and outward for tension. Do this by passing a single eigenvalue (of stress or strain tensor) as the signed_scale and the corresponding eigenvector as the orientation_scale field, with repeat mirror. Use a separate points graphics for each eigenvalue. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd>cmzn_graphicspointattributes_set_glyph_repeat_mode</dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">point_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The point attributes to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">signed_scale_field</span></tt> - <p>The signed scale field to set. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1ae08fb1a51ff3f2402486a126db001a91"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_graphicssamplingattributes_id <strong>cmzn_graphics_get_graphicssamplingattributes</strong>(cmzn_graphics_id graphics)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>If the graphics samples points from elements then returns a handle to sampling attribute object for specifying sampling mode, density field etc.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to sampling attributes object, or 0 if not supported for graphics type or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to request sampling attributes from. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1aae1854a483603187685e5cb46664416e"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_graphicssamplingattributes_id <strong>cmzn_graphicssamplingattributes_access</strong>(cmzn_graphicssamplingattributes_id sampling_attributes)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a new reference to the sampling attributes with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>New sampling attributes reference with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">sampling_attributes</span></tt> - <p>The graphics sampling attributes to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincgraphics_8h_1afdd078f2056059033f8093b970af4e0f"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_graphicssamplingattributes_destroy</strong>(cmzn_graphicssamplingattributes_id * sampling_attributes_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this reference to the sampling attributes, and sets it to 0. Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>

All new objects are unmanaged unless stated otherwise.</p>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

</dd>
</dl>
</p>

<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1aa7f671de0d2b4c5c1d10da8502ffe5e2"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_nodeset_id <strong>cmzn_fieldmodule_find_nodeset_by_name</strong>(cmzn_fieldmodule_id fieldmodule, const char * nodeset_name)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get a handle to a nodeset from its name in the field module. A nodeset is the container of nodes - i.e. cmzn_node objects. Valid names may be any node_group field, or the following special names: &#8220;nodes&#8221; = the primary set of nodes for a region, able to be indexed by cmzn_elements for storing or mapping to finite element field parameters. &#8220;datapoints&#8221; = an additional set of nodes generally used to represent data points, not for finite element field parameters. Note that the default names for node group fields created from a group is GROUP_NAME.NODESET_NAME, with nodeset names as above.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to the nodeset, or 0 if error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">fieldmodule</span></tt> - <p>The field module the nodeset belongs to. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">name</span></tt> - <p>The name of the nodeset. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<p><p>Create a new node in this nodeset with fields defined as in the node_template. Returns handle to new element.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dd>Handle to newly created node, or NULL if error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">

<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1a50c1219577113d2c8bd531858b3ad65f"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_nodeiterator_id <strong>cmzn_nodeset_create_nodeiterator</strong>(cmzn_nodeset_id nodeset)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Create a node iterator object for iterating through the nodes in the nodeset which are ordered from lowest to highest identifier. The iterator initially points at the position before the first node, so the first call to cmzn_nodeiterator_next() returns the first node and advances the iterator. Iterator becomes invalid if nodeset is modified or any of its nodes are given new identifiers.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to node_iterator at position before first, or NULL if error. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">nodeset</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the nodeset to iterate over. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</p>
<blockquote>

<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1af19babd61f18bdbaba6ea1118aa32a6a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodeset_destroy_nodes_conditional</strong>(cmzn_nodeset_id nodeset, cmzn_field_id conditional_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroy all nodes in the nodeset for which the conditional field is true i.e. non-zero valued. These nodes are removed from any related groups they are in. All handles to removed nodes become invalid. Nodes are only removed if not in use by elements in region. Note that group and node_group fields are valid conditional fields.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">nodeset</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the nodeset to destroy nodes from. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">conditional_field</span></tt> - <p>Field which if non-zero at any node indicates it is to be destroyed. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<p><p>Cast nodeset group back to its base nodeset class. IMPORTANT NOTE: Returned nodeset does not have incremented reference count and must not be destroyed. Use this function to call base-class API, e.g.: int size = cmzn_nodeset_get_size(cmzn_nodeset_group_base_cast(nodeset_group);</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Non-accessed handle to the nodeset or NULL if failed. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">nodeset_group</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the nodeset group to cast. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodeset_group_remove_nodes_conditional</strong>(cmzn_nodeset_group_id nodeset_group, cmzn_field_id conditional_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

<p><p>Remove all nodes from the nodeset group for which the conditional field is true i.e. non-zero valued in the node. Note that group and node_group fields are valid conditional fields.</p>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>

</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

</p>

<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1ae6c5a49f1351d090994dc8361d4f53a1"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_nodetemplate_id <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_access</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a new handle to the node template with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new handle.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dd>New node template handle with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">mesh</span></tt> - <p>The node template to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_destroy</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id * node_template_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this handle to the node_template and sets it to NULL. Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template_address</span></tt> - <p>Address of handle to node_template to destroy. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1a383d17f3e20e6e72ae13cda00aa4097b"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_define_field</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template, cmzn_field_id field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Defines the field on the node_template with just a single node value per field component with no time variation. Per-component derivatives and multiple versions can be added subsequently.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template</span></tt> - <p>Node template to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to define. May be finite_element, stored_string or stored_mesh_location type only. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1adfc4397a3b4fd51cefef731d00b4b7eb"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_define_field_from_node</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template, cmzn_field_id field, cmzn_node_id node)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Defines the field on the node_template based on its definition in the supplied node.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template</span></tt> - <p>Node template to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to define. May be finite_element, stored_string or stored_mesh_location type only. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node</span></tt> - <p>The node to obtain the field definition from. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1ab466dabbb30a1ffa323efe439a6f9f19"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_get_value_number_of_versions</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template, cmzn_field_id field, int component_number, enum cmzn_node_value_label node_value_label)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Gets the number of value/derivative parameters under a given node value label for a field component in the node template.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Number of versions value label in component of field, or maximum in any component if component_number is -1. Valid return value can be 0. Returns 0 if field not defined or invalid arguments are supplied. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template</span></tt> - <p>Node template to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to query value/derivative parameters for. Must be finite_element type only. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">component_number</span></tt> - <p>The component from 1 to the number of field components, or -1 to get maximum number of versions in any component. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_value_label</span></tt> - <p>The label of the node value/derivative to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1a4b7e2648834caa09cc5fcb86aead7901"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_set_value_number_of_versions</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template, cmzn_field_id field, int component_number, enum cmzn_node_value_label node_value_label, int number_of_versions)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the number of value/derivative parameters under a given node value label for a field component in the node template. Must have first called cmzn_nodetemplate_define_field() for field. Limitation: Zinc is currently limited to having either 0 versions for a derivative label (but at least 1 for the VALUE), or the same positive number of versions for all value/derivative perameters. Callers should assume this will be fixed in a future release, and therefore set the number of versions independently for each value/derivative. For now the largest number of versions set for any value/derivative will be the amount of storage set aside per-field-component, and the field will need to be undefined then re-defined to reduce the number of versions.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template</span></tt> - <p>Node template to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to define value/derivative parameters for. Must be finite_element type only. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">component_number</span></tt> - <p>The component from 1 to the number of field components, or -1 to define identically for all components. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_value_label</span></tt> - <p>The label of the node value/derivative to define. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">number_of_versions</span></tt> - <p>The number of versions of the value to define. Can be 0 to request no parameters be stored, however the storage allocated may be greater. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1afb9603aab0ba99eb4c8ec20502b865e5"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_timesequence_id <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_get_timesequence</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template, cmzn_field_id field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns the time sequence defined for field in node_template, if any.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to time sequence object if defined for field, or NULL if none or error. Up to caller to destroy returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template</span></tt> - <p>Node template to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to get time sequence for. May be finite_element type only. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincnode_8h_1a3a2182dcbef102ad15b3cef1cd7fb023"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_nodetemplate_set_timesequence</strong>(cmzn_nodetemplate_id node_template, cmzn_field_id field, struct cmzn_timesequence * timesequence)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Defines variation of all nodal values/derivatives * versions with the supplied time sequence for all components of the field in the node template. Hence there will be as many of each parameter as times in the time sequence.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_template</span></tt> - <p>Node template to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to define versions for. May be finite_element type only. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">timesequence</span></tt> - <p>Time sequence object defining the number of times for which field parameters are stored, and the times they are for (increasing). </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">node_field_creator</span></tt> - <p>Optionally defines different versions and/or derivative types. If it is NULL then a single nodal value for each component will be defined. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>

</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The field to undefine. May be finite_element, stored_string or stored_mesh_location type only. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>

<dd>the correct enum type if a match is found. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">attribute_name</span></tt> - <p>string of the short enumerator name </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1ac6f390e1c84bc221ad815ebfefea56d1"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API char * <strong>cmzn_optimisation_attribute_enum_to_string</strong>(enum cmzn_optimisation_attribute attribute)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Return an allocated short name of the enum type from the provided enum. User must call cmzn_deallocate to destroy the successfully returned string.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>an allocated string which stored the short name of the enum. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">attribute</span></tt> - <p>enum to be converted into string </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1aacd05ee8b54ee70af6377bedad51b5df"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_optimisation_get_first_independent_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Get the first independent field from the optimisation problem description. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd><a class="reference internal" href="#zincoptimisation_8h_1a5b794f2ee6bac4592e3bd875af1c149a"><em>cmzn_optimisation_get_next_independent_field</em></a></dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to first independent field or NULL if none. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a5b794f2ee6bac4592e3bd875af1c149a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_optimisation_get_next_independent_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation, cmzn_field_id ref_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the next independent field in the optimisation problem description after the supplied ref_field. Use to iterate over the independent fields, taking care to destroy all returned field handles exactly once:</p>
<p>cmzn_field_id field = cmzn_optimisation_get_first_objective_field(optimisation); while (field) { cmzn_field_id next_field = cmzn_optimisation_get_next_objective_field(optimisation, field); cmzn_field_destroy(&amp;field); field = next_field; }</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to next independent field after ref_field or NULL if none. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">ref_field</span></tt> - <p>Handle to an independent field from the optimisation. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a12b92bca3d841ab6bf64649093a94a82"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_optimisation_add_independent_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation, cmzn_field_id field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Add an independent field to the given optimisation problem description. Valid independent fields are limited to constant and finite_element types. The parameters of these fields are modified to minimise the objective fields. NOTE: Beware that many existing cubic Hermite meshes in EX format do not correctly share common value or derivative versions and thus will &#8216;open up&#8217; during fitting/optimisation.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if field successfully added, any other value if failed or already added. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>Real-valued independent field to add to the optimisation object (accessed internally so safe for caller to destroy locally). </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a60718f20333098ede417af147df359f7"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_optimisation_remove_independent_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation, cmzn_field_id field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Remove an independent field from the optimisation problem.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if field successfully removed, any other value if failed or field not found. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The independent field to remove. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1aab264860d1abf40734a80100ae4da7c6"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_optimisation_get_first_objective_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p>Get the first objective field from the optimisation problem description. <dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>See</strong></dt>
<dd><a class="reference internal" href="#zincoptimisation_8h_1a41fb1624317a4e00bd752aebc4554090"><em>cmzn_optimisation_get_next_objective_field</em></a></dd>
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to first objective field or NULL if none. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a41fb1624317a4e00bd752aebc4554090"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_field_id <strong>cmzn_optimisation_get_next_objective_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation, cmzn_field_id ref_field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the next objective field in the optimisation problem description after the supplied ref_field. Use to iterate over the objective fields, taking care to destroy all returned field handles exactly once:</p>
<p>cmzn_field_id field = cmzn_optimisation_get_first_objective_field(optimisation); while (field) { cmzn_field_id next_field = cmzn_optimisation_get_next_objective_field(optimisation, field); cmzn_field_destroy(&amp;field); field = next_field; }</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Handle to next objective field after ref_field or NULL if none. Up to caller to destroy the returned handle. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object to query. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">ref_field</span></tt> - <p>Handle to an objective field from the optimisation. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a1ec6e9111675614d4d93bee6404e3133"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_optimisation_add_objective_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation, cmzn_field_id field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Add an objective field to the optimisation problem description. Valid objective fields must be spatially constant. The least squares solution method treats fields performing a sum of squares (nodeset_sum_squares, nodeset_mean_squares) specially, passing each term to the optimiser. The overall objective function becomes the sum of all components of all objective fields, or for the least-squares method, the sum of the squares of all terms (or components if the objective field is not a sum of squares).</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if field successfully added, any other value if failed or already added. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>Real-valued objective field to add to the optimisation object (accessed internally so safe for caller to destroy locally). </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a660fbf102ba853d268af8d6769c824e5"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_optimisation_remove_objective_field</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation, cmzn_field_id field)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Remove an objective field from the optimisation problem.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if field successfully removed, any other value if failed or field not found. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">field</span></tt> - <p>The objective field to remove. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a17e22a1987bbbf8d58060d227ab6bad7"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API char * <strong>cmzn_optimisation_get_solution_report</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get a textual report on the last solution.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Allocated string containing report which user must free using cmzn_deallocate, or NULL on error or if haven&#8217;t performed optimisation yet. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the optimisation object to query. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincoptimisation_8h_1a42e54c2e482be9853a9574482f26f629"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_optimisation_optimise</strong>(cmzn_optimisation_id optimisation)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Perform the optimisation described by the provided optimisation object.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK if optimisation completed successfully (stopping criteria satisfied), and any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">optimisation</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the zinc optimisation object. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>
<div class="line-block" id="zincregion_8h">
<div class="line"><em>file</em> <strong>region.h</strong></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/elementid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/fieldid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/fieldmoduleid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/nodeid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/sceneid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/streamid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/regionid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;zinc/zincsharedobject.h&#8221;</em></div>
</div>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p></p>
<em>Functions</em><blockquote>
<div><p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1ab12074045668f8c7d4a03dea5d01aad0"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_region_id <strong>cmzn_region_access</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>FILE : region.h</p>
<p>The public interface to region objects used to managed models and submodels in a tree-like structure. Each region owns its own fields and subregions, and may have a scene attached to it which holds its graphics. Returns a new reference to the region with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>New region reference with incremented reference count. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The region to obtain a new reference to. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1a3419269cd19b3fb7cbd26b57047c9aec"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_region_destroy</strong>(cmzn_region_id * region_address)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Destroys this handle to the region, and sets it to NULL. Internally this just decrements the reference count.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region_address</span></tt> - <p>The address to the handle of the region to be destroyed. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1ab3d5ca3b64a46ed4dc5af26ffc7d713b"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_region_begin_change</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Begin caching or increment cache level for this region only. Call this function before making multiple changes to the region or its fields and objects via its field_module to minimise number of change messages sent to clients. Must call cmzn_region_end_change after making changes. Important: Do not pair with cmzn_region_end_hierarchical_change. Note: region change caching encompasses field_module change caching so there is no need to call cmzn_fieldmodule_begin_change/end_change as well.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The region to begin change cache on. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1aedb608de98c937556a02ced7351b0d2a"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_region_end_change</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Decrement cache level or end caching of changes for this region only. Call cmzn_region_begin_change before making multiple field or region changes and call this afterwards. When change level is restored to zero in region, cached change messages are sent out to clients. Important: Do not pair with cmzn_region_begin_hierarchical_change.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The region to end change cache on. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1ac96369e28777feccd3eeca31785adf14"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_region_begin_hierarchical_change</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Begin caching or increment cache level for all regions in a tree, used to efficiently and safely make hierarchical field changes or modify the tree. Must call cmzn_region_begin_hierarchical_change after modifications made. Important: Do not pair with non-hierarchical cmzn_region_end_change.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The root of the region tree to begin change cache on. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1ad1ce6a63a56be8548719e8c736b3b170"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_region_end_hierarchical_change</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Decrement cache level or end caching of changes for all regions in a tree. Call cmzn_region_begin_hierarchical_change before making hierarchical field changes or modifying the region tree, and call this afterwards. When change level is restored to zero in any region, cached change messages are sent out. Important: Do not pair with non-hierarchical cmzn_region_begin_change.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The root of the region tree to end change cache on. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1a8dfcf42a7104ec333d017c6e3b4671c8"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API char * <strong>cmzn_region_get_name</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns the name of the region.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>On success: allocated string containing region name. Up to caller to free using cmzn_deallocate(). </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The region whose name is requested. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1a8a288a4db9c70050d76adb9aa3cb96ec"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_region_set_name</strong>(cmzn_region_id region, const char * name)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Sets the name of the region. Any name is valid as long as it is unique in the parent region, however use of forward slash characters &#8216;/&#8217; in names is discouraged since it prevent regions being found by paths.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The region to be named. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">name</span></tt> - <p>The new name for the region. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1ad569a22e6d940b2077ca1489fd78fc13"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_region_id <strong>cmzn_region_get_parent</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a reference to the parent region of this region.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Accessed reference to parent region, or NULL if none. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The child region. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1a66ed9a795c2346e7c3fa89b81fa7eb47"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_region_id <strong>cmzn_region_get_first_child</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns a reference to the first child region of this region.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Accessed reference to first child region, or NULL if none. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">region</span></tt> - <p>The region whose first child is requested. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincregion_8h_1ae7cc2cbd62a05994179ebdb3e0faccc8"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_region_id <strong>cmzn_region_get_next_sibling</strong>(cmzn_region_id region)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>

Fails if new_child is unnamed or the name is already used by another child of this region.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<blockquote>

<p><p>FILE : scene.h</p>
<p>The public interface to a zinc scene, which gives the graphical representation of a region Returns a new reference to the scene with reference count incremented. Caller is responsible for destroying the new reference.</p>

</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Use this function with cmzn_scene_end_change.</p>
<p>Use this function before making multiple changes on the scene, this will stop scene from executing any immediate changes made in scene. After multiple changes have been made, use cmzn_scene_end_change to execute all changes made previously in scene at once.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">

<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>

</li>
</ul>
</dd>

</p>

<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1a6bf6474bfc53046b66c10b2f9e9fe4f6"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_scene_convert_to_point_cloud</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene, cmzn_scenefilter_id filter, cmzn_nodeset_id nodeset, cmzn_field_id coordinate_field, double line_density, double line_density_scale_factor, double surface_density, double surface_density_scale_factor)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Creates a cloud of points (nodes) in the supplied nodeset sampled at random locations according to a Poisson distribution on the lines and surfaces that are in the scene tree (filtered by the optional filter), i.e. including all its descendents. Points/nodes are created with the next available identifier. The density of points is set by supplied arguments and may be scaled by data values stored in each graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise some other error code including CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>The root scene containing graphics to convert. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">filter</span></tt> - <p>The filter determining which graphics from the scene tree are converted. If not supplied then all graphics are converted. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">nodeset</span></tt> - <p>The nodeset to add nodes to. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">coordinate_field</span></tt> - <p>The coordinate field to be defined and assigned on the new nodes. Must be from the same region as the nodeset. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_density</span></tt> - <p>The expected number of points per unit length for lines. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">line_density_scale_factor</span></tt> - <p>If a lines graphics has a data field the mean value of its first component multiplied by this factor is added to the expected value. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">surface_density</span></tt> - <p>The expected number of points per unit area of surfaces. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">surface_density_scale_factor</span></tt> - <p>If a surfaces graphics has a data field the mean value of its first component multiplied by this factor is added to the expected value. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>

<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">selection_field</span></tt> - <p>Group field to be used as the selection. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1acf6352b2523e15407b7ea92147530c34"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_scene_get_spectrum_data_range</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene, cmzn_scenefilter_id filter, cmzn_spectrum_id spectrum, int valuesCount, double * minimumValuesOut, double * maximumValuesOut)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Get the range of graphics data field values rendered with the spectrum. Search is limited to the scene and its sub-scenes with an optional filter. Spectrum colour bar glyphs do not contribute to the range.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>The number of data components for which a valid range is obtainable, which can be more or less than the valuesCount so must be tested if more than one component range requested. Returns 0 on any other error including bad arguments. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>Handle to the root scene to search. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">filter</span></tt> - <p>Optional filter on which graphics to get data range from. If omitted, then all graphics within the scene tree contribute. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">spectrum</span></tt> - <p>The spectrum to get the range for. Only data for graphics using this spectrum contribute to the range. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">valuesCount</span></tt> - <p>The number of data values to get the minimum and maximum range for, at least 1. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">minimumValuesOut</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive the data value minimums. Must be at least as large as valuesCount. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">maximumValuesOut</span></tt> - <p>Array to receive the data value maximums. Must be at least as large as valuesCount. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1aa70872da3d2f103862941755efbc8074"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API bool <strong>cmzn_scene_get_visibility_flag</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Returns the state of the scene&#8217;s visibility flag.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Boolean value true if visibility flag is set, false if not. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>The handle to the scene. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1af138101a8af08fad9d41a13da5ddb418"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_scene_set_visibility_flag</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene, bool visibility_flag)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Set the state of the scene&#8217;s visibility flag. Note this only affects visibility of graphics when a scene filter is acting on it.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>The handle to the scene. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">visibility_flag</span></tt> - <p>Boolean true to set, false to clear. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1a8e8d75dca0d579f726beb7e98db01a60"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_scene_move_graphics_before</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene, cmzn_graphics_id graphics, cmzn_graphics_id ref_graphics)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Move a graphics to the position before ref_graphics in the scene&#8217;s graphics list, or last in the list if no reference graphics supplied. Earlier graphics are drawn first and in hardware rendering their pixel fragments are displayed in priority over later graphics at the same depth.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>The scene to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to be moved. Must be from scene. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">ref_graphics</span></tt> - <p>Another graphics from this scene to insert before, or NULL to move graphics to last position in list. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1a3b5822d284f0f9bc8e50ed99dd99ceef"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_scene_remove_all_graphics</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Removes all graphics from the scene.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>The scene to modify. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1aebaeb4eed46c44707b3bf82861a4c800"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API int <strong>cmzn_scene_remove_graphics</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene, cmzn_graphics_id graphics)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Removes a graphics from scene and decrements the position of all subsequent graphics.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, otherwise CMZN_ERROR_ARGUMENT. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>The scene to modify. </p>
</li>
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">graphics</span></tt> - <p>The graphics to be removed. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
<p><span class="target" id="zincscene_8h_1aa67333e3aee247a8ecb9a8182ead9dc8"></span><div class="line-block">
<div class="line">ZINC_API cmzn_scenepicker_id <strong>cmzn_scene_create_scenepicker</strong>(cmzn_scene_id scene)</div>
</div>
</p>
<blockquote>
<div><p></p>
<p><p>Create a scene picker which user can use to define a picking volume and find the onjects included in this volume.</p>
<p><dl class="docutils">
<dt><strong>Return</strong></dt>
<dd>Status CMZN_OK on success, any other value on failure. </dd>
<dt><strong>Parameters</strong></dt>
<dd><ul class="breatheparameterlist first last">
<li><tt class="first docutils literal"><span class="pre">scene</span></tt> - <p>Scene to create the scene picker for. </p>
</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</p>
</p>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>
</div></blockquote>
<div class="line-block" id="zincscenefilter_8h">

<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/fieldid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/graphicsid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/regionid.h&#8221;</em></div>
<div class="line"><em>#include &#8220;types/scenefilterid.h&#8221;</em></div>
